page.title: 19Environment
page.content: This area has sandy soil. There is a certain amount of erosion of the cliffs. Where there is thick vegetation growing the{erosion}takes place more slowly. There is very little{pollution}in the rivers here,but occasionally oil from tanker ships comes in with the tide and dead and dying sea birds are found on the beach.The weather is usually mild and average amounts of rainfall. During the winter N.E. winds come in from the sea sometimes of gale force 9. There are many footpaths for hikers and nature lovers. Gorse bushes grow well here also bracken. Pine trees and tamarisk grow near the coast and many others in land .
